contentList.content: Calls upon celestial energy to heal and renew, mending wounds and restoring vitality.
A superior healing spell of immense power, allowing you to channel your healing energy into a focused beam of rejuvenation.
Unleash a sudden and intense burst of psychic energy, damaging all nearby enemies within your radius.
Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Restores a fellow party member to full health, an immensely potent ability that can shift the tide of the battle.
Unleash a flurry of [2] blazing, high-powered projectiles, each dealing [1]. They always find their mark.
Unleash a white pillar of radiant and necrotic fire, a fusion of holy and profane energies.
Channel the fierce, unending might of the infernal phoenix, unleashing a searing ray of fire. Inflicts [1] and engulfs the target in flames.
Conjure a Defensive barrier that makes creatures and objects inside it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all damage.
Harness the might of the hells in battle as you beckon forth a fiendish ally.
Form a vengeful pact and summon Drakthul, the formidable Half-Demon warrior, as your loyal companion who will wield his malevolent might to aid you in your fights.
Forge a dark covenant and summon Ravenna, the mighty Half-Demon Protector, as your unwavering companion who will channel her infernal powers support you in your endeavors.
Enter into a sinister pact and conjure Mizora, an otherworldly Half-Demon, as a steadfast companion who will harness her demonic abilities to assist you in your endeavors.
Gains a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
When you eliminate an enemy using a melee attack, shroud yourself in a veil of darkness, rendering you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Channel the arcane might within you to conjure [1] colossal, crimson, crackling energy beam(s), capable of unleashing a devastating surge of force that deals [2].

The target's defenses are compromised, resulting in a reduction of their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> by 2 and their <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> is lowered by 3.
Summon the fearsome beasts to stand vigil by your side in the heat of battle, reinforcing your ranks with an indomitable force.
Summon Guenhwyvar, the Ethereal Feline Companion to aid you in your adventures.
Scratch a target with a powerful attack.
Embrace the legacy of Drizzt, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with scimitars, daggers and longbows.
You gain a +[1] bonus to Spell Attack Rolls and Spell Save DC.
Grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage and empowers your weapon attacks with an additional [1].
Tap into your ancestral animal heritage by entering a primal trance that lets you transform into various creatures, gaining their unique abilities and enhancing your adaptability
As your bond with shifting forms intensifies, you gain the ability to rapidly heal and rejuvenate, bolstering your resilience in the heat of battle.
Tap into your shapeshifting affinity to mend minor wounds, demonstrating your growing control over form and healing.
Unleash your shapeshifting prowess to heal injuries more effectively, showcasing your mastery over the connection between form and healing.
Channel your profound mastery of shapeshifting to mend severe wounds, showcasing your unparalleled control over the symbiotic relationship between form and healing.
Grants <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, Light Armor and Medium Armor.
Awaken your primal instincts and unleash your inner beast to Gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FERAL_SWIFTNESS">Feral Swiftness</LSTag>.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and jump distance is doubled, and it can take one additional action per turn.
Assume the shape of a Black bear that can Goad enemies into attacking it.
Channel the unwavering devotion of the Absolute cult, bringing forth loyal followers who stand ready to serve their dark and mysterious cause.
Summon Dror Ragzlin, the fearsome hobgoblin barbarian whose unwavering loyalty to the cult is equaled only by his relentless and untamed might.
Summon True Soul Nere, the formidable sorcerer of the Absolute cult, whose mastery of arcane forces is surpassed only by his unwavering dedication to the cult's cause.
Summon Minthara, the devout servant of Lolth and resolute commander within the Absolute cult, whose unwavering faith in her dual oaths bolsters her allies and strikes fear into her enemies.
Summon Marcus, the darkly devoted paladin in the service of the Absolute, whose necrotic power and unwavering allegiance strengthen your cause and sow dread among your foes.
Grants <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, Light Armor, Medium Armor and Heavy Armor.
Has a 1d4 penalty to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.
Harness the force of Aard to release a powerful gust of wind from your hand dealing [1], knocking back and potentially making foes in front of you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Channel the power of Igni to unleash devastating flames from your hand. engulfing your target or area in searing flames, dealing [1].

Invoke the protective magic of Quen to create a shimmering force shield around yourself. Grants you 20 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing, Piercing and Bludgeoning. While Quen is active, those who strike you will endure [1].

Create a magic seal on the ground. When a creature enters the seal, they take [1] and [2]. The targets must succeed on a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Only one yrden seal can be active at a time.
Utilize the mesmerizing power of Axii to temporarily <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> an enemy, causing them to become friendly and fight by your side.

Granting 20 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning damage. Those who dare to attack you while the shield is active will suffer [1].
The Witcher's signs are at your disposal, ready to be wielded at will.
Your body, fortified through the Trial of the Grasses, grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage. You gain +4 bonus to initiative rolls.

Witcher's path is unforgiving. Your journey as a monster hunter has taught you to excel against the supernatural. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against Undead, Fiends, Beasts, and Monstrosities.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when targeting Undead, Fiends, Beasts, and Monstrosities.
Channel your signs into your weapon, forging it into a conduit of untamed elemental forces. Your strikes manifest as surges of arcane power, dealing 1d4 damage of your chosen type.
Channel the power of Igni into your weapon, causing it to burst into flames. Your melee attacks deals an additional [1].
Infuse your weapon with the power of Aard, crackling with thunderous energy. Your melee attacks deals an additional [1].
Channel the protective aura of Quen into your weapon, creating a shimmering force. Your melee attacks deals an additional [1].
Enchant your weapon with the radiant energy of Yrden, glowing with purple light. Your melee attacks deals an additional [1].
Imbue your weapon with the psychic influence of Axii, creating an otherworldly aura. Your melee attacks deals an additional [1].
Your weapon has been infused with energy, attacks with this weapon deal extra damage.

With a fervent prayer and a raised hand, you call upon the divine wrath, channeling the righteous fury of the gods into a powerful bolt of divine energy. A powerful single-target bolt capable of dealing an immense [1] to enemies or heal ally for [2].

The target of Judgment Bolt is branded with the Divine Verdict, which carries one of two effects based on their alignment. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PURIFICATION">Purification</LSTag> radiates healing energy, mending the wounds of allies, while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONDEMNATION">Condemnation</LSTag> inflicts radiant damage upon foes.
Throughout the next 3 rounds, the affected target regains [1] at the start of each round.

Throughout the next 3 rounds, the affected target takes [1] at the start of each round and has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on attack rolls against the target.
Summon the wrath of Shar to conjure [1] mighty beam/s of shadow-infused energy. The beam/s pierce through the battlefield, delivering a devastating [2] to the target.
If the enemy fails its saving throw against the spell, it becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blind</LSTag>.

Drawing upon your Dragonkin Heritage, unleash a potent breath weapon that embodies the elemental essence of your draconic ancestry. Flames, frost, acid, or lightning surge forth, bearing the indomitable mark of your dragon bloodline.
Unleash a searing inferno upon your foes, engulfing them in scorching flames. Dealing [1] and subjecting them to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFERNO_GRASP">Inferno's Grasp</LSTag>.
Unleash a frigid blast upon your foes, encasing them in freezing ice. Dealing [1] and leaving them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ICESHIVER">Iceshivered</LSTag>.
Unleash a torrent of corrosive acid upon your foes. Dealing [1] and leaving their armor <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CORRODED_ARMOR">Corroded</LSTag> and weakened.
Unleash a surge of electrifying energy upon your foes. Dealing [1] and leaving them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELECTRIFY">Electrified</LSTag>.
Dealing [1] at the end of the turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is halved, dealing [1] at the end of the turn.
Armour Class has been reduced by 1.

Unable to take <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag>, attackers have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the target.
Grants 10 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage

Upon entering combat, your draconic blood surges, granting 10 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Physical damage for 1 turn.
Evoke a chilling tempest of ice and frost to descend from the sky, blanketing the earth and striking all objects and creatures within its range.

Invoke the icy arts of the cryomancer and brand a target with a shimmering sigil of frost. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they suffer <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROSTBITE">Frostbite</LSTag>.

The target's movement speed is halved as the icy chill of the mark hinders their mobility. The target becomes <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Cold damage, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disdvantage">Disdvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Upon striking your foe, you siphon their life force, dealing [1] and healing yourself for the amount of damage inflicted.
When cast on a Humanoid or a Beast, they will be affected by Soulbind.
The affected entity is weakened, experiencing a halved movement speed and a -2 penalty to damage rolls.
Unleash a sinister, emerald ray from your outstretched hand. If the [1] reduces the target to 0 hit points, they crumble into a pile of ashen remnants.

Unleash the wrath of the vengeful revenant, draining the life force of those nearby and becoming the harbinger of death. As it deals [1] in a radius, you also gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEATHS_RESONANCE">Death's Resonance</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="UNDYING_EDGE">Undying Edge</LSTag>.
You gain a +2 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and become <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Upon activating Revenant's Fury, you draw power from the abyss, infusing your weapon with unholy energy. Your melee weapon attacks now deals additional Necrotic damage.

Conjures an ever-changing dome, filled with mischievous energy. Upon entering, allies receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ETHEREAL_VIGOR">Ethereal Vigor</LSTag>, boosting their defenses and attacks. Enemies, however, fall victim to the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ETHEREAL_ENSNAREMENT">Ethereal Ensnarement</LSTag>.
Within the Trickster's Sanctuary, allies granted protection while enemies face the Trickster Might.

Take [1] at the start of each turn while inside Trickster's Sanctuary. Have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is halved.

Grants a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> and your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> are made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. You can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> inside the dome.
You possess an uncanny knack for avoiding danger and tricking your foes. You Gain immunity to surprise and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> psychic damage.
Your every strike carries the potential to draw blood, Possibly inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> when you attack.
When you succeed on a Saving Throw, the foe responsible takes [1], and you gain +[2] bonus to Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.
When you land a killing blow on an enemy, you gain a temporary surge of vitality that heals you for [1].
%%% Tech Status Astral Surge Heal VFX
%%% Tech Status Astral Surge Heal VFX

Conjure a shimmering ring around you. Inside this mystical battleground, your allies gain Psychic <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>, are shielded from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, and weapons deal additional [1].

Nearby allies gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage, immunity from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and weapon attacks deal an additional [1].

Gained Psychic <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>, immunity from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Attacks deal an additional [1].

You utter a guttural, Githyanki incantation, focusing your energy on a single target. If the target has [1] hit points or fewer, it dies instantly. If it has more than [1] hit points, it takes 55-100 Damage.
Draw upon your profound connection to the Astral Plane, summoning forth fierce and devoted Githyanki warriors to stand by your side.
Channeling your psionic energy, you invoke the presence of Orpheus, the Githyanki Prince. A true guardian of the Astral Plane, to guide you in your path.
Drawing upon the eldritch might within you, you beckon Thalos, the formidable Githyanki Warlock, to stand with you in battle. A master of otherworldly invocations and eldritch knowledge.
With a focused invocation, you call upon Kythra, the formidable Githyanki Eldritch Knight, to join your side in the heat of battle. A master of martial combat and arcane magic.

Harness the mighty powers of the God of Thunder! You enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="THOR_FURY">Stormbringer</LSTag> state. Gaining access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_Lightning_Punch">Lightning Punch</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Shout_EirsBlessing">Eir's Blessing</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_MightyDive">Mighty Dive</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Rush_AsgardianCharge">Asgardian Charge</LSTag> abilities.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Physical, Lightning and Thunder damage. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saves</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Thor's Fury ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.
Use a bonus action to end Thor's Fury.

Deals an additional [1] with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Also has Resistance to Physical, Lightning and Thunder damage. Has Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot concentrate on spells.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Stormbringer ends early if you have not attacked an enemy or taken damage during your last turn.

The affected target loses the ability to react, suffers <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and endures [1] at the start of each turn. Additionally, attacks against foes wearing metal armor are made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Cannot take reactions and suffers [1] at the start of their turn.
Channel the fury of the storm and unleash its wrath upon all targets within range. Deals [1] and [2], you can select up to [3] area of effects.
Draw upon the divine favor of Eir as it mends your wounds and heals you.
Leap down unto a foe, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. You won't take falling damage. You must be above your target.
Charge forward with thunderous speed and unbridled force, attacking all enemies in the way and possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

The God of Thunder makes you stronger.

You have Resistance to Physical, Lightning and Thunder damage. You gain Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

.

While in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="THOR_FURY">Stormbringer</LSTag> state, you can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_Lightning_Punch">Lightning Punch</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Shout_EirsBlessing">Eir's Blessing</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_MightyDive">Mighty Dive</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Rush_AsgardianCharge">Asgardian Charge</LSTag>.
The wearer gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">melee attack rolls</LSTag> while surrounded by [1] or more foes.
You gain Proficiency and Expertise in Persuasion and Intimidation.
Unleash a mighty lightning strike with your weapon. The impact pushes the target [1] and may knock it prone.
After vanquishing a foe, your movement speed is instantly restored to its maximum.
With the ancient and unholy knowledge at your command, you utter a blood curse incantation that invokes Logarius's dark legacy, delivering [1] to a single target. There is no escape.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> You take half the damage dealt.

Unleash the darkness within, dealing [1]. On successful hit the target start <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>, suffering ongoing damage. Your life essence surges as you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLOODFLOW">Bloodflow</LSTag> for 3 turns.
With the power of Lifesteal coursing through you, regain [1] at the start of each turn.

Channeling the surging power of darkness, you willingly sacrifice a fourth of your life essence, trading it for heightened strength. As you embrace this sacrifice, you enter Bloodborne state, shrouding yourself in a crimson aura of energy that both fortifies and empowers your very being.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> You sacrifice fourth of your health.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to necrotic damage. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Fear</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> effects hold no sway over you. Your melee weapon is imbued with a powerful <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLOODBORNE_CURSE">Curse</LSTag> that can inflict necrotic bleeding on your foes, and its <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Passive_Tainted_Strike">Tainted Strikes</LSTag> allows you to deal additional damage.
Melee weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
Inflict [1] upon your target, target must make wisdom saving throws or suffer Necrotic Damage overtime.
Affected entity takes [1] at round start and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Constitution Saving throws. Can be removed by healing.
Call upon the Bloodsworn Knight from the remains of a fallen foe, ready to serve and defend you. It's a dark and unholy resurrection, turning the fallen into a loyal guardian.
You become more accurate when attacking creatures already injured, gaining a +[1] bonus to your Attack Rolls.

When you trigger <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Shout_Thor_Fury">Thor Fury</LSTag>, hostile creatures within a [1] radius must succeed in a Wisdom Saving Throw, or they suffer [2] damage. Targets receive half the damage on a successful save.
Blessed by the divine favor of Selûne, at the start of each turn, you regain [1] hit points.
Immobilize a target, and after 3 rounds, the target transforms into solid gold, remaining in this state until the spell's duration expires.
The target will become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIDAS_GILDED">Gilded</LSTag> if it does not succeed on its <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> within [1] turns.
Turned into solid gold. Incapacitated and unable to move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.
Wield the might of creation and make a wish to restore an expended resource of your choosing or to grant upon you certain benefits.
Eliminate any current curses and hexes that have taken hold of you.
Summon a chest filled with essential camp supplies, healing potions and elixirs.

Breach into an enemy's mind and tear it down to pieces, dealing [1]. Inflict <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws, you gain Attack <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the target.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Attack Rolls, Dexterity Saving Throws and becomes easier to hit.

Grow to a gigantic size. Your weapons deal an additional [1] damage and you gain [2] and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> using Strength, and weapon attacks deal an additional damage.

Affected entity's size is increased. Weapon attacks deal an additional [1] damage. It gains [2], and has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
A shield of cold vengeance protects you. When struck by a melee attack, your icy aura inflicts [1] upon the attacker.
You are immune to the Frightened condition and cannot be subject to other emotional influences.

You are the Wrath of Avernus, a feared force, both by demons and devils alike. Unleash a fiery burst that deals [2] to all around you within a [1] radius. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to fire damage and +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, with each successful attack you accumulate a stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WRATH_OF_AVERNUS_COUNTER_0">Avernus's Wrath</LSTag>, building toward a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WRATH_OF_AVERNUS_ACTIVE">searing assault</LSTag> upon your enemies.

When the condition ends, you're left <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WRATH_OF_AVERNUS_EXHAUSTED">Drained</LSTag>, for harnessing such fiery might takes considerable effort, and everything has its price.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Will drain character power when condition ends.
Your legacy hasn't been forgotten! After four attacks, you can unleash the devastating <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_AvernusSearingSmite">Avernus Searing Smite</LSTag> upon your enemy.

You are the Wrath of Avernus! for 3 turns you can unleash the formidable <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_AvernusSearingSmite">Avernus Searing Smite</LSTag>. After activating <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Target_AvernusSearingSmite">Avernus Searing Smite</LSTag> you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WRATH_OF_AVERNUS_EXHAUSTED">Drained of Power</LSTag>.
Your weapon attack deals an extra [1] and sets the target on fire, causing them to suffer an additional [2] every turn.
The entity is drained of its power, its movement speed is halved, and it has 1d4 penalty to attack rolls.

Unleash a deadly enchantment that combines the power of lightning and mind manipulation into a single mesmerizing beam. On impact, it deals [1] and [2] while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">charming</LSTag> the target.
Counter your foe with a burst of psychic might that deals [1].
Counter your foe with a burst of psychic might that deals [1].
When a foe hits you, you can use your reaction and counter with a burst of psychic might that deals [1].
Summon forth the enchanted cauldron of the renowned Witch Queen Tasha, brimming with mystery and the alchemical potential to craft potent elixirs and potions.
